meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stylish or fashionable in clothing or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her dressiness always stood out at the party with her elegant gown.
meanings.sent2: The dressiness of his outfit made him the best-dressed man at the event.
meanings.sent3: The dressiness of the cat in a tiny hat brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The dressiness of the room was like a burst of color in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The dressiness of the flower garden was a sight to behold, with each bloom carefully chosen.

meanings.definition: The act of dressing up or wearing formal attire.
meanings.sent1: She loved the dressiness of getting ready for a fancy dinner.
meanings.sent2: The dressiness of the occasion called for a tuxedo and bow tie.
meanings.sent3: The dressiness of the penguin in a top hat was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The dressiness of the event was like stepping into a royal ball.
meanings.sent5: The dressiness of the theater premiere had everyone in their finest clothes.
